ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank the Erasmus + exchange program for supporting L.A.M., R.J.C., O.L., and C.M. We thank Prof. Dr. Ir. R. A. J. Janssen for solar cell research facilities, Universiteit van Amsterdam for structural support, and Hysen Drogu for graphical design in Figure 3 . This work is part of the research program of the Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research (NWO).
